contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} '''USS ''Mississippi''''', named either for the state of [[Mississippi]] or the [[Mississippi River]], may refer to: *{{USS|Mississippi|1841}} was a sidewheel frigate that saw action in the Mexicanâ€“American War and was lost during the American Civil War *{{USS|Mississippi|BB-23}} was the lead ship of the {{sclass-|Mississippi|battleship|4}} of battleships, saw action before World War I and was eventually sold to Greece *{{USS|Mississippi|BB-41}} was a {{sclass-|New Mexico|battleship}} and saw action during World War II *{{USS|Mississippi|CGN-40}} was a {{sclass-|Virginia|cruiser|0}} nuclear-powered guided missile cruiser *{{USS|Mississippi|SSN-782}} is a {{sclass-|Virginia|submarine}} commissioned in 2012 ;See also *{{MV|Mississippi}} refers to several United States Army Corps of Engineers towboats *[[CSS Mississippi|CSS ''Mississippi'']] refers to a projected [[ironclad]] of the Confederate States Navy {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mississippi, USS}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]] [[Category:United States Navy Mississippi-related ships]]
